data.comment: The big names in today's match at Bravida Arena have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orebro's half?
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
In the minute 3, Fredrik Klitte awards Orebro a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Orebro.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Orebro in their own half.
Hacken's Patrik Walemark has run offside.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Orebro have a goal kick.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Orebro's Deniz Hummet gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hacken defender.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken's Leo Bengtsson gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 15, Hacken drive upfield and Ali Youssef gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orebro defender.
In Gothenburg Hacken attack through Patrik Walemark. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Orebro in their own half.
Orebro's Nordin Gerzic breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
In the minute 17, Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ali Hussein for Orebro drives towards goal at Bravida Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Hacken.
In the minute 21, Ahmed Yasin (Hacken) has missed a penalty!
Hacken's Ali Youssef misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Orebro at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 22, Orebro have a goal kick.
Ali Youssef scores to make it 1-0 at Bravida Arena.
Leo Bengtsson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 27, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Orebro in their own half.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
In the minute 29, Fredrik Klitte awards Hacken a goal kick.
Free kick Orebro.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Orebro throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
Hacken push upfield but Fredrik Klitte quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Deniz Hummet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orebro.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Hacken take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Leo Bengtsson.
Great play from Nikola Gulan to set up the goal.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 44, Great finish from Ahmed Yasin to give Hacken a 3-0 lead.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Gothenburg.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Gothenburg.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Patrik Walemark (Hacken) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 47, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Orebro.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Orebro at Bravida Arena.
Leo Bengtsson (Hacken) has received a yellow card from Fredrik Klitte.
Ball goes out of play for a Orebro goal kick.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Hacken just outside Orebro's area.
In the minute 53, Fredrik Klitte awards Hacken a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Orebro.
In the minute 59, Hacken to take a throw-in in Orebro territory.
Throw-in Hacken.
In the minute 61, Free kick Hacken.
Orebro make their first substitution with Dennis Collander replacing David Seger.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
In the minute 66, Orebro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andreas Alm is making the team's first substitution at Bravida Arena with Viktor Lundberg replacing Patrik Walemark.
Alexander Soderlund is replacing Ali Youssef for the home team.
In the minute 66, Johan Hammar is on a sub for Rasmus Lindgren for Hacken.
Throw-in for Orebro close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 72, Michael Almeback (Orebro) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
Corner awarded to Orebro.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Nikola Gulan with Oskar Sverrisson.
Orebro have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 81, Axel Kjall (Orebro) is making a second substitution, with Simon Amin replacing Nordin Gerzic.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Hacken.
Hacken's Viktor Lundberg breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, Orebro have a goal kick.
Orebro are whistled for offside.
Fredrik Klitte awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Alexander Faltsetas is replacing Leo Bengtsson for the home team.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Orebro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Orebro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Orebro.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
At Bravida Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
